abstract: European regulators fined the two companies $456 million for being part of a cartel in eight European countries.
snippet: European regulators fined the two companies $456 million for being part of a cartel in eight European countries.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS — European antitrust authorities levied stiff fines on Wednesday on the household products companies Procter & Gamble and Unilever for price-fixing that arose during efforts to make greener packaging for laundry detergents.

headline.main: Unilever and P.&G. Fined for Fixing Price of Detergent
headline.print_headline: Unilever and P.&G. Fined for Fixing Price of Detergent
